name: Lights Camera Salt!
description:
Lights, Camera, Salt! is a 2D Endless Runner with a mechanic similar to the likes of Flappy Bird.

Salt Bae has decided to shoot a movie on a quest to gain even more followers. The stakes couldn't be higher. Fortunately, you control a salt monster...

Change the size of the salt monster, catch steaks and cook 'em on the go! Don't forget to avoid any knives or rotating shish fire sticks. Salt Bae is fire enough.

KEYS:

SPACE - Up & Down

F - Special Frost Attack (1 Min. Cooldown, freezes everything for a short amount of time!)
